submission:
class Solution:
    def countOfPairs(self, nums: List[int]) -> int:
        MOD = 10**9+7
        mx = max(nums)
        pre = nums[0]
        pre1 = [i+1 for i in range(pre+1)] + [0]*(mx-pre+1)
        for num in nums[1:]:
            pre2 = [0]*(mx+2)
            for v in range(num+1):
                pre2[v] = pre2[v-1]
                v2 = num - v
                pre_v = min(v, pre-v2)
                if pre_v < 0:
                    continue
                pre2[v] += pre1[pre_v]
            pre = num
            pre1 = pre2
        return max(pre1) % MOD
